name: Plug and Switch
description:
Play as plug and solve unique puzzle to turn on the diode.

Flip switches and have fun!

WSAD - Movement

R - Restart level

Enter - Select

ESC - Back

"Unplugged" is free expansion pack, that will include:

  • New mode "Unplugged" - with new unique levels, and mechanics.
  • Updated UI
  • Bug fixes
  • And more!

The patch will drop after nomination of the winners!

Programming - Kawyn

Art and Game design - Olga Rudnicka

Special thanks - Kinga Koryńska
